first_para: Damian Patrick George Hinds (born 27 November 1969) is a British Conservative Party politician and the Member of Parliament (MP) for the East Hampshire constituency. He is Parliamentary Private Secretary to Mark Francois, the Minister for Defence Personnel, Welfare and Veterans.

full.extract: Damian Patrick George Hinds (born 27 November 1969) is a British Conservative Party politician and the Member of Parliament (MP) for the East Hampshire constituency. He is Parliamentary Private Secretary to Mark Francois, the Minister for Defence Personnel, Welfare and Veterans.
full.title: Damian Hinds
